model

Interface UserHash

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    User

    public interface UserHash
    Userhash implements methods for user as they relate to a hashtable datastructure.
    Author:
    Joe

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAlbum(java.lang.String albumName)
      Adds an album object to the currently logged in user, returns false if the album could not be added.
      boolean deleteAblum(java.lang.String albumName)
      Removes an album object from the current user.
      Album hashAlbum(java.lang.String albumName)
      Hash to an album via a user inputed album name.
      java.util.ArrayList<Album> listAlbums()
      lists all albums associated with a current user, returns false if no ablums exist.
      boolean renameAlbum(java.lang.String albumName, java.lang.String newAblumName)
      Renames the album targeted by the first argument to the string passed in via the second argument.
      java.util.ArrayList<Photo> searchForPhotos(java.lang.String photoName)
      This is for commands that request a photo but do not explicitly state which album the photo is in.
